skills.name: Merciless Claws
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with claws and disturbs the enemy's HP recovery for 1 turn.

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skills.name: Surprise Attack
skills.description: Dashes towards an enemy, inflicting damage 2 times. Each attack has a 30% chance to stun the target for 1 turn. The damage is proportionate to my MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.16*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Disdain (Passive)
skills.description: If your HP status is higher than the enemy's, your attacks will deal additional damage that is proportionate to your MAX HP. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.
